content:
This is a discussion stream for the Unscheduled Care Track proposed for January 2017.

Hello, FHIR implementers,

One of the thoughts my team and I walked away with from our first Connectathon (in September) was that it would be beneficial to try out a few workflows specific to the emergency medicine/urgent care domain in the next Connectathon. We worked with the Emergency Medicine WG and submitted a proposal. It is available at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201701_Unscheduled_Care. I wanted to see if these workflows resonate with others here and who would be interested in participating in such a track at the January Connectathon. Please reply to this if you're interested or email me - svoicucomendant at tsystem dot com. Thank you!
